title: Giant amoeba
data:
{{obsolete}} {{list of | jellies}} {{monster |name=giant amoeba |glyph={{Blue|J}} |tile=[[File:Giant amoeba.png]] |flags={{No skeleton flag}}
{{No zombie flag}}
{{Sense invisible flag}} |resistances={{Poison resistance}}, {{Constriction resistance}},
{{Drown resistance}}, {{Asphyxiation resistance}} |vulnerabilities=None |max_chunks=4 |meat={{Contaminated+poisoned corpse}} |xp=646 |holiness={{Natural}} |magic_resistance=48 |hp_range=50-83 |avg_hp=66 |armour_class=0 |evasion=4 |habitat=Amphibious |speed= 10 |size={{Large}} |item_use={{Uses nothing}} |attack1=25 ({{Hit type}}: {{Plain flavour}}) |attack2= |attack3= |attack4= |hit_dice=12 |base_hp=3 |extra_hp=5 |fixed_hp=0 |intelligence={{Plant intelligence}} |genus=jelly |species=giant amoeba }} {{Flavour|A massive pulsating organism that uses thick pseudopods of protoplasm to ooze through the dungeons in search of food.}} ==Useful Info== '''Giant amoebas''' are one of the least exotic jelly-type monsters; although they hit somewhat hard, they have no special abilities. Their only noteworthy trait is that they actually leave an edible [[corpse]] when defeated (if you have [[poison]] resistance and don't mind eating contaminated [[chunk]]s). They can be found in or near [[the Slime Pits]], and occasionally in the lower parts of [[the Dungeon]] and [[the Vaults]]. ==Tips & Tricks== None needed, unless it appears unusually early. Be grateful. ==History== Giant amoebas were removed in [[0.14]] [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
